Text: POW.SOUTHFRONT.PRESS presents a database of Ukrainian
POWs video testimonies. It covers betrayal by
commanders, crimes, disappointments and revelations.
The database already contains more than 600 video
stories of AFU servicemen and is updated daily.
All these people are united by one tragedy - the
takeover of Ukraine by the puppet regime in Kiev.______________________________________POW.SOUTHFRONT.PRESS
